smile... Yet as a "Saint," she'd surely bond with Priests.

Jeanne is a devout leader who empowers allies with healing and buffs. In dire straits, she sacrifices herself to secure victory.
Chinese:
神情坚毅的少女，自称是一名“英灵”，是阿尔托莉雅从迷雾庭院中带回来的。至于为什么会在迷雾庭院嘛，贞德和阿尔托莉雅只是笑了笑......不过据说这位可是“圣女”，想来与普瑞斯特应该会聊的很来吧？

贞德是一名信仰坚定的修士，拥有强大指挥才能的她能够大幅增幅队友的能力，同时会使用各式的力量治愈友军。在必要的情况下，她亦会毫不犹豫的牺牲自己，以求获得能够取胜的力量。

English: No matter the suffering, we march onward.
Chinese: 无论什么样的苦难之路，都只能勇往直前。

English: As long as this banner stands, we shall not fall!
Chinese: 只要这面旗帜还在，就不会溃败！

English: Leave it to me—stay behind my shield!
Chinese: 请交给我吧，站在我的背后！

English: Let the Lord's divine work manifest here!
To fall... after coming this far...
Let us begin! O Lord, grant me strength.
Chinese: 要上了啊！请主赐予我力量。

English: If we cannot advance without fighting, then we shall defeat the enemy!
Chinese: 不战斗就不能前进的话，那就打倒敌人吧！
好像稍微变强了一些呢。

English: Keep improving. One might call it a leap forward.
Chinese: 继续提升。可称之为飞跃吧。

English: I will stand with you always. Be it suffering or sorrow, together we shall overcome! Come, let us strive onward, Master!
Chinese: 无论何时，都与您相伴。无论是苦难还是悲叹，只要与您在一起，一定能够克服！来吧，一起努力吧，御主！

English: Yes, I am indeed your Servant. My duty is to protect and guide you to the best of my ability.
Chinese: 嗯，我确实是您的从者。我的职责是尽可能保护您、引导您。

English: As your Servant and you as my Master, let us continue to work together!
Chinese: 我作为从者，您作为御主，我们彼此今后也要一起努力哦！

English: Master, if you don't head out soon, you'll never become an excellent Master!
Chinese: 御主，再不出门的话，可当不了一个优秀的御主哦？

English: Though I know not of chivalric codes, I know my duty as a standard-bearer. Stay close, Master.
Chinese: 尽管我不知道什么是骑士的准则，但作为一名持旗之人该做什么，我还是很清楚的。一定要紧紧跟上我哦，御主。

English: Forgive me, but I must crush you!
Chinese: 非常抱歉，但我要击溃你！

English: I ask of you—are you my Master?
Chinese: 遵从召唤而来。试问，您就是我的Master吗？

English:
Artoria, with dragon’s blood, possesses immense mana reserves. Recovers 4 HP and gains 1 Mana each turn.

<color=#919191>- Active from Level 1.
Chinese:
阿尔托莉雅，拥有龙的血脉，这般强大的力量使其魔力异常充沛，一呼一吸间皆能汲取庞大的魔力。每回合开始时，阿尔托莉雅回复4点生命值并获得1点魔力

 <color=#919191>- 此被动从1级开始生效。

English:
A knight resembling a delicate maiden, claiming to be a "Heroic Spirit" who appeared suddenly in Lucy’s room, addressing her as "Master." "Heroic Spirits" shouldn’t exist on the Ark—a curious mystery...

Artoria is a formidable knight, dealing heavy damage with sword arts and mana while taunting enemies to protect allies.
Chinese:
看上去像是柔弱少女的骑士，自称是一名“英灵”，据说是突然出现在露西房中的，称呼露西为Master。按理来说，“英灵”是不应该存在于方舟的，关于这一点，实在是耐人寻味......

阿尔托莉雅是一名强大的骑士，能够使用剑技与魔力对敌方造成大量伤害，同时还能激怒敌人以此保护队友。

English: Heal the wounded. The battle continues.
Chinese: 为伤者治疗。战斗还将继续。
冷静下来，不要掉以轻心。

English: To fall... here of all places...

Chinese: 拼尽所有实力放马过来吧。

English: Even if I regain my form as a king, our oath remains. My holy sword is yours to command.
Chinese: 就算恢复成作为王那时的模样，我们的誓约也不会改变。我的圣剑任由您的差遣。

English: Your orders bring me comfort—a strange warmth. If my blade holds any power, I shall wield it wholly for you, Master.
Chinese: 您的指示让人感觉很舒心。有种不可思议的暖意。若我的剑还存有些许力量，一定会全心全意帮助您的，御主。

English: Hmm. A预感 of gains... Let’s investigate.
Chinese: 嗯。有种收获的预感……去看看情况吧。

English: This is a battle to save humanity. Our burden is grave, Master.
Chinese: 这是为了拯救人类的战斗。我们的责任无比沉重，御主。

English: I once sought the Holy Grail for reasons, but that is past. If it is evil, it must be corrected.
Chinese: 我曾怀着某种原因执着于圣杯探索，但那已经是过去的事了。若为邪恶之物，那就必须纠正。

English: A Servant must obey their Master, but mutual trust is ideal.
Chinese: 从者必须服从御主，但如果双方能相互信赖就好了。

English: But... yes. I once wondered: What life might I have led had I not drawn the sword of kingship?
Chinese: 但是……对。我曾经有过小小的幻想。如若我没有拔出王之剑，那我将过上怎样的人生呢。

English: How is this? I hope it meets your expectations.
Chinese: 您觉得如何？ 若能满足您的期待就好了。

English: A fine opportunity. I’ll teach you properly.
Chinese: 这是个好机会，我来好好教育你。

English:
When dealing damage, 5% chance to inflict Instant Death. Deals 150% damage to Bosses instead.
On Critical Hit: Deals 20% of damage dealt as bonus damage.

When equipped by the Old Man of the Mountain: Rings「<color=#808080>Evening Bell</color>」every 10 kills.
Current: &a/10

<color=#808080>A plain greatsword. Steeped in the faith of one who wielded it relentlessly. Its attacks carry Instant Death—rare but lethal 
even to mighty foes. The wielder, merged with death, resists Instant Death and charm.</color>
Chinese:
对敌方造成伤害时，5%概率使其即死，若目标为Boss，则改为造成150%伤害
暴击时：额外对目标造成本次伤害20%的伤害

山の翁装备时：每击杀10个敌人，敲响「<color=#808080>晚钟</color>」
当前：&a/10

<color=#808080>稀疏平常的大剑。
被这个人物一生不断挥舞，不断坚信的信仰所浸透。

据说由于这个人物始终在幽谷境界中行走，
因此他的剑的所有攻击都会附加即死效果。
虽然概率很低，
但无论多厉害的强敌都会遭到即死的危险性。
身在幽谷之人早已习惯了死亡，
由于与死早已同化，因此拥有即死耐性与魅惑耐性。</color>

English:
When taking ally damage, deals equal defense-ignoring damage to a random enemy.

When equipped by Heracles: Deals 200% of this damage.

<color=#808080>A crude "axe-sword" forged from temple stone—Berserker’s catalyst. Only his superhuman strength can wield it.</color>
Chinese:
受到友方伤害时，随机对一名敌方单位造成等额的无视防御的伤害

赫拉克勒斯装备时：造成200%该伤害

<color=#808080>这并非宝具。让人认为“与其说斧子，不如说是岩块更恰当”的粗鲁的剑。由神殿的基石做成，也是召唤Berserker的触媒。正因为是有超常腕力，Berserker才能自如操纵这把武器</color>

English:
When using attack skills, Overheal all allies by 15% of Healing Power.

When equipped by Jeanne: Generates 1「<color=#B22222>Flamebrand Holy Sword</color>」each turn.

<color=#808080>Jeanne’s sheathed silver blade, unused in life. Perhaps she preferred her banner... or spared it from bloodshed.</color>
Chinese:
使用攻击技能时，超额治疗全体友方相当于自身15%治疗力的生命值

贞德装备时：每回合生成「<color=#B22222>红莲圣剑</color>」

<color=#808080>贞德生前的佩剑，现已出鞘。银辉闪耀、流光溢彩，这可不是什么装饰用的剑！至于为何从未被使用，或许是某位圣女大人更偏向于使用某种长柄的、飘动的武器......啊，不是！一定是圣女大人怜爱众生，不愿意使这把圣洁的银剑成为杀戮之物吧！</color>

English:
When using attack skills, Overheal all allies by 1 HP.

Unsheathes after 20 attack skills.
Current: &a/20

<color=#808080>Jeanne’s pristine sword, awaiting its first draw.</color>
Chinese:
使用攻击技能时，超额治疗全体友方1点生命值

使用20个攻击技能后，剑将出鞘（当前&a/20）

<color=#808080>贞德生前的佩剑，尚未出鞘。据说从未被使用过，不知今后是否能一睹其风采。</color></color>

English:
+1 Exchange count.

When equipped by Jeanne: Allies take 10% less damage.

<color=#808080>Jeanne’s banner-turned-weapon. “It has a spear tip! Divine guidance to bonk foes!” (Please stop her)</color>
Chinese:
交换手牌的次数+1

贞德装备时：全体友方受到伤害减少10%<color=#B22222></color>

<color=#808080>贞德生前使用的旗帜，作为贞德的英灵化伴生武器出现。附带一提，贞德专门使用这面旗子来攻击。本人在遭到旗子制裁的人面前总是以“（旗子）前端装了枪尖，也就是要我用这面旗子来殴打别人的启示对吧”来辩解。请阻止她。</color>

English:
Prevents damage when HP reaches 0 or in Death's Door state, healing 50% max HP and granting 「Invincible」.
This effect cannot trigger again until restored at camp.
Current status: &a

<color=#808080></color>When equipped with 「<color=#F0BC1F>Excalibur</color>」:
Max HP +30%
Damage Taken -25%
Status Resistance +44%
When Artoria equips: Gain 1 stack of 「Parry」 per turn.
Chinese:
体力为0或濒死状态下受到伤害时，阻止这次伤害并回复50%最大生命值且赋予自身「无敌」
以上效果触发后，直到在营地内恢复之前都无法再次触发。
当前状态：&a

<color=#808080></color>与「<color=#F0BC1F>誓约胜利之剑</color>」共同装备时：
最大生命值+30%
受到伤害-25%
异常状态抗性+44%<color=#F0BC1F></color>
阿尔托莉雅装备时：
每回合获得1层「招架」</color>

English:
When equipped by Artoria: Speed +1, Defense Penetration +10%.

<color=#808080>He who draws this sword shall be England’s king! Defeat powerful foes to unlock its true power.</color>
Chinese:
阿尔托莉雅装备时，速度+1，防御穿透+10%

<color=#808080>拔出此剑者，即为英格兰之王!
击败一名强大的敌人后，这把剑将得到晋升</color></color>

English:
<color=#808080>He who draws this sword shall be England’s king! 
Prove your worth by defeating 2 powerful foes to unsheathe it.</color>
Chinese:
<color=#808080>拔出此剑者，即为英格兰之王！
带上她，展现你身为王的气量，
击败2名强大的敌人后，这把剑将会出鞘</color>

English:
With "Avalon": Starts battle with「<color=#F0BC1F>Noble Phantasm Release: Excalibur</color>」

When equipped by Artoria: 
Speed +1
Defense Penetration +20%
Grants「<color=#FF4500>Hero Creation</color>」at battle start.

<color=#808080>“Excalibur—the crystallization of warriors’ hopes, wielded by the King of Knights to sever fate!”</color>
Chinese:
与「遥远的理想乡」同时装备时：
战斗开始时生成「<color=#F0BC1F>宝具解放·誓约胜利之剑</color>」<color=#F0BC1F></color>
阿尔托莉雅装备时：
速度+1
防御穿透+20%
战斗开始时，赋予自身「<color=red><color=#FF4500>英雄作成</color></color>」

<color=#808080>“那把剑正是从过去未来消逝在战场上的所有士兵，在临终之际怀抱的虽悲伤但尊贵的梦想，那样的意志值得夸耀，那样的信义必须贯彻，常胜之王高声的念出手上奇迹的真名，那正是------誓约胜利之剑（Excalibur）”</color>

English:
All allies’ Critical Hit rate +5%. 
Every 2 turns, Critical Hits grant 1 Mana.

<color=#808080>Calming incense guiding souls to serenity. May your spirit find peace.</color>
Chinese:
全体成员暴击率+5%
两回合一次，暴击时获得1点法力值
<color=#808080>能令人心情平静的香。
弥漫的烟会引导你前往幽玄境地。
愿灵魂获得安宁。</color>

English:
All attack skills gain +4 damage but inflict 3 <sprite=1> Pain damage per use.

<color=#808080>A fragile maiden’s winter memory in a fleeting sanctuary.</color>
Chinese:
使所有的攻击技能伤害+4，且释放时对自身造成3点痛苦<sprite=1>伤害

<color=#808080>——短暂的寄生之地。
一位脆弱而高傲的少女，
曾在此地的冬日记忆。</color>

English:
Speed +2. 
Deals 3 damage and inflicts「Trample」on all enemies each turn.

<color=#808080>O once-kingly maiden, command this steed to the world’s end!</color>
Chinese:
速度+2
每回合对敌方全体造成3点伤害并施加「践踏」

<color=#808080>曾经是少女的王啊，请下命令！
哪怕要前往世界的尽头，
想必东·斯塔利恩也会遵命！</color>

English:
Mana +1. 
Draws 1 extra skill on even turns.

<color=#808080>Kingship is divine yet transient. Crowns shine bright before empires fall.</color>
Chinese:
法力值+1
偶数回合额外抽取一个技能

<color=#808080>传承如是说。
所谓王，即为高贵而神圣，高不可攀之人。
结局总是充实而富足的未来。
星辰如是说。
然时代会变迁，生活会变化。
王的统治终将走向毁灭。</color>

English:
A sword lodged in stone. 
The inscription reads: “He who draws this shall be England’s king!”
Chinese:
一把插在岩石中的剑
岩石上写着：拔出此剑者，即为英格兰之王！

English: [A]O lost soul, dost thou hear the toll of the Bell of Judgment?
[A]Listen well, the Bell of Judgment has revealed thy name...
Chinese: [A]倾听吧，晚钟已揭示汝之名讳......

English: [A]Thy head shall be claimed another time...
[A]Thou art a warrior worthy of respect, yet thy mind remains fractured...
Chinese: [A]汝是值得敬佩的战士，可惜此刻心智不全......

English: [A]Thou dost not seem versed in social graces...
[A]Be calm. These flames shall not scorch thee...

Chinese: [B]阁下看起来真是一位可靠的同伴

English: [B]Where’d a cryptic one like you come from?
Chinese: [B]神神秘秘的，你到底从哪儿来的？

English: [A]Fool blinded by spite! Relinquish thy head!
Chinese: [A]被仇恨蒙蔽双眼的蠢货，交出首级吧！

English: [B]How do you live in such a state?
[A]All shall return to dust. Be not awed...
Chinese: [A]吾必将归于尘土，汝不必惊讶......

English: [A]Shouldst thou fall, thy allies too shall grieve...
Chinese: [A]若汝倒下，汝之同伴亦会痛苦......

English: [A]Tread cautiously. Endure not beyond thy means...
[B]True, your aura’s scary...but your armor’s so cool!
Chinese: [B]说的也是，你虽然气场很恐怖，但是你的盔甲真的很帅欸！
[B]那......那个，您可以让我摸一摸您的剑吗？

English: [B]To think there exists one stranger than I...
Chinese: [B]想不到竟有比我还奇异的存在。

English: [B]I sense you are steeped in faith.
Chinese: [B]我能感觉到，你浑身充满了信仰。

English: [B]Even one such as you holds faith?
[A]In this life, I shall walk in my Lord's light...
[B]Hey, could you do me a favor?

Chinese: [A]圣女·贞德，汝之牺牲令人敬佩......

English: [A]King of Knights, hast thou found answers on this journey?
Chinese: [A]骑士王啊，汝此行可寻得答案？

English: [A]Though I bear thee no ill will...

Chinese: [B]老先生，这是我的朋友，他叫伊芙。

English: [B]To think an assassin like you exists?
[A]Hassan of the Hundred Faces? (Swinging sword) Relinquish thy head!
[A]Merely the scent of the Hundred Faces... A misjudgment...
[A]I did not expect to find you here.
[A]With thee present, our path is assured.

Chinese: [B]不好意思，请问你要做什么吗？

English: [A]Even a warrior as mighty as thee can have reason eroded...
Chinese: [A]想你这样强大的战士，也会被侵蚀理智啊。
[A]不过，有你在，至少让我信心大增了。

English: [A]How adorable, makes me want to tease you a bit~
Chinese: [A]真可爱，让人很想欺负一下呢~

English: [A]Just kidding! How about becoming my little sister instead?
Chinese: [A]开玩笑的啦，要不然你来当我的妹妹吧！

English: [B](Whispering) Jeanne, if I use this kind of magic, I won't be punished by the Lord, right?!
Chinese: [B]（悄悄的）贞德，我用这种魔法，不会被神明大人制裁吧！

English: [A](Pretending to lift her flagpole) I shall carry out the Lord's judgment right now!
Chinese: [A]（假装提起旗杆）我现在就代主行罚！

English: [B]Can someone who smashes people with a flagpole (points) really be called a saint?
Chinese: [B]你这样的（指用旗杆砸人），也算圣女吗？

English: [A](Confidently) The spike on this flagpole must be divine revelation from the Lord!
Chinese: [A]（理直气壮）旗杆上装了尖头，这一定是吾主给予我的启示！

English: [B]Huh? What kind of revelation is that?
[A]Revelation to smite others with this banner!
Chinese: [A]启示我用这面旗帜去制裁他人啊！

English: [B]So... how does a saint's skin feel to the touch?
[B]I mean, when whipped by a lash.
Chinese: [B]我是说，用鞭子抽上去的感觉。

English: [A]No, it means Arbiter. I enact the Lord's judgments upon the world.
Chinese: [A]不，是裁定者，我代主裁决世间。

English: [B]Sounds like you're quite confident in yourself...
Chinese: [B]听上去你对自己挺有自信的......

English: [A]Not in myself, but in my absolute faith in the Lord.
Chinese: [A]并非，而是我对吾主信心十足。

English: [B]I'll protect everyone. Don't get too close.
Chinese: [B]我会保护你们的，你不要靠得太近。

English: [A]Mister, I've actually been fighting on the battlefield all along, you know?
Chinese: [A]大叔，其实我一直在战场上作战哦？

English: [A]Don't let my appearance fool you - I often charge straight into enemy formations!
Chinese: [A]别看我这样，其实我经常冲入敌阵啊！

English: [B]A saint? I don't believe in that nonsense.
[A]That's fine. Belief or not, we're comrades-in-arms now.
Chinese: [A]没关系，无论你信或不信，我们现在至少是战友。

English: [B]True enough. But I'll be watching you.
[A](Attempting to poke his eyes) Perfect, I enjoy this kind of interaction~
Chinese: [A]（尝试戳他的眼睛）正好我喜欢这样干呢~

English: [B]If gods truly exist, why would she...
Chinese: [B]神明如果存在的话，为什么她会......

English: [A]When I was tied to the stake, I wondered the same...
Chinese: [A]我被绑在火刑架上的时候，也曾闪过这样的念头呢

English: [A]But afterward, my nation was restored. That's when I learned: to gain something, you must lose something.
Chinese: [A]但是之后我的国家就复兴了，那时我才知道，你想要得到，你就得失去。

English: [A]Tell me - what did you seek that cost you her?
Chinese: [A]告诉我，你是为了什么，才会失去她？
[B]你的这面旗子，似乎不会损坏？

English: [A]Truly miraculous. I believe only divine intervention could explain it.
Chinese: [A]确实很神奇，我想，这除了神迹以外，再无它解了吧？

English: [A]Thanks to you, our casualties have been minimal.
Chinese: [A]多亏了你，我们的损伤才能这么小。
[A]哎呀，真是个让人欢喜的小姑娘。

English: [B]⁄(⁄ ⁄ ⁄ _  ⁄ ⁄ ⁄)⁄ W-What are you saying all of a sudden...
[A]If you were in my army, I might have you replace Gilles~
Chinese: [A]要是你在我的军队里，也许我会让你接替吉尔呢~

English: [A]You flatter me. I'm just a village girl. You're the true beauty here.
Chinese: [A]不敢当，只是一届村姑罢了。在我看来你才是大美人。

English: [B]Such silver tongue! Worthy of a saint, indeed?
[A](Amused yet exasperated) Even saints aren't required to have that skill, you know?
Chinese: [A]（哭笑不得）就算是圣女，也没包含这一项吧？

English: [B]Hahaha, no matter! The sentiment's what counts! Have some barbecue!
Chinese: [B]哈哈哈，没关系！意思到了就行！给你吃烤肉！

English: [A]Mmm, truly delicious! May the Lord bless you.
